content.rendered:
[vc_row padding_top_multiplier=”2x” padding_bottom_multiplier=”2x”][vc_column]

[vc_column_text]

If you are working in the Digital Signage industry, Webkey would love to hear from you.
We are happy to offer Digital Signage companies a wide variety of solutions with our application:
  • We are happy to set-up a partnership agreement with you.
  • We can whitelable our app to be incorporated in the Content Management Software that you are offering.
  • We would also gladly work together with OEMs to have our app signed and then build a working relationship around this.

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]

Screen mirroring and remote access and control are great features, but if you are working in the Digital Signage industry Webkey is ready to offer you solutions that can help you grow.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row desktop_visibility=”hide” tablet_visibility=”hide” tablet_sm_visibility=”hide” mobile_visibility=”hide”][vc_column]

Find out more about the advantages of partnering with Webkey.
[/vc_column][/vc_row]
